# YOUR CODE HERE
N, T, P = map(int, input().split())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = sum(1 for l in L if l >= T)
if count >= P:
    print(0)
else:
    days = 1
    while True:
        count = sum(1 for l in L if l + days >= T)
        if count >= P:
            print(days)
            break
        days += 1
